attributes.action: add an oppose button to all proposed petitions
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: All the proposed petitions only allow people to show support for a petition. An oppose button will allow people to show support against a particular petition.

rejection.details: Comments about the petitions system should be sent to number10@petitions.pm.gov.uk.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
